attributes.title: terrible app ağŸ¤¢ğŸ¤®
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I have ever downloaded in my entire life. Just within the first minutes of using it, it crashes my phone and almost gets it shut down. It also uses up your battery like crazy (10% in 5 minutes). My friend had a literal ANXIETY ATTACK after opening the app for the first time. It was one of the scariest moments in both of our lives, as neither of us knew what to do. The images and videos displayed on here are NOT FOR EVERYONE. There were no warnings left for anyone to brace themselves for what they were about to see. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP, especially if you are easily triggered. This app needs to be taken down.
